Package algorithms.graphs

Class RegionAdjacencyGraphColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.graphs.RegionAdjacencyGraph
      • algorithms.graphs.RegionAdjacencyGraphColor
  • public class RegionAdjacencyGraphColor
extends RegionAdjacencyGraph
    class to hold a list of region nodes and calculate an adjacency map for them and pairwise color differences or similarity.
    Author:
    nichole
